author: Fidelis Mbah
title: Unanswered questions as Nigeria braces for coronavirus lockdown
description: Small business owners worry about cash flow as Nigeria prepares to go into lockdown later on Thursday.
content:
Nigerians are bracing for a partial lockdown from Thursday as authorities try to contain the spread of coronavirus cases in the country of about 200 million people.
Markets, religious centres, schools, offices and leisure spots have already been shut in some… [+3160 chars]
